description:
chromeos: Receive PeripheralBatteryStatusSignal from power_manager

BUG=chromium:221420


Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=191324

messages.text:
you'll need to update DEPS after the .proto change is in

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc
File chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc#newcode378
chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc:378: int level = protobuf_status.level();
int level = protobuf_status.has_level() ?
    protobuf_status.level() : -1;

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h
File chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h#newcode60
chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h:60: virtual void PeripheralBatteryStatusReceived(std::string path,
use const std::string& instead for this argument and the next one

DEPS updated

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc
File chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc#newcode378
chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.cc:378: int level = protobuf_status.level();
On 2013/03/28 01:59:33, Daniel Erat wrote:
> int level = protobuf_status.has_level() ?
>     protobuf_status.level() : -1;

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h
File chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12491027/diff/1/chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h#newcode60
chromeos/dbus/power_manager_client.h:60: virtual void PeripheralBatteryStatusReceived(std::string path,
On 2013/03/28 01:59:33, Daniel Erat wrote:
> use const std::string& instead for this argument and the next one

Done.
